Using Radiance, I would like to evaluate daylighting in adjoint areas in an atrium.


I could only find genblind that simulate Venetian blind. Would you please tell me commands that can simulate roller blind(diffuse reflection) and solar film blind(speculation reflection)


Is it possible to have a solar sensor to trigger Up/Down motions of motorised roller blind and motorised solar film?


Where can I find examples of Atrium?




Thanks a lot!
